string.text: Stash: Railcar above the bridge \nDuring regrouping I hid ammunition in the railcar. Don't forget.
Stash: Railcar above the bridge \nDuring regrouping I hid ammunition in the railcar. Don't forget.
Stash: Railcar above the bridge \nQuietly stashed my artifacts here at night. No one will get to them here for sure.
Stash: Fallen man's belongings \nSaw how a bloodsucker dried out a stalker. The dead man's loot is so-so... Decided to stash it for now.
Stash: Fallen man's belongings \nNear the railway tunnel in the forest a stalker got caught in an anomaly. I hid his gear. A jacket and some buckshot.
Stash: Fallen man's belongings \nSaw how some stalker got caught in an anomaly near the railway tunnel in the forest. His gear seemed pretty decent.
Stash: Cross near the bandit camp \nNear the bandit camp, under the cross, I hid the loot.
Stash: Cross near the bandit camp \nA lone stalker got cocky, decided to skim off an artifact, could've lived. Now he lies under the cross, guarding the artifact.
Stash: Cross near the bandit camp \nWe scammed a sucker out of some artifacts. Let them lie here until we move on.
Stash: Bandit cache \nLifted the loot off Mitya. Until they notice, I decided to stash it...
Stash: Bandit cache \nA crate seized by bandits was found in the attic of the central building. Need to prepare a squad and take it back.
Stash: Bandit cache \nTomorrow the boss will come for the common fund. He's not getting my artifact.
Stash: Under the cross \nDropped a soldier. The loot is complete junk, but there's oil like dirt. Decided to bury part of it.
Stash: Under the cross \nTricked a stalker out of two artifacts. Handing them over to the common fund-no way. Hid them here.
Stash: Under the cross \nWhen my brothers and I were fighting off the dogs in uniform, I buried some goods under the cross. Let it sit there.
Stash: Attic shelter \nI shoved the backpack into the attic. I'll come back for it later-can't right now.
Stash: Attic shelter \nSaw how a soldier hid some clear booze. No way he's getting it. I stashed it on the roof of one of the houses. Later I'll sit down with the guys and thank that soldier.
Stash: Attic shelter \nStashed the loot in the attic. I'll come back later-for now it's not possible.
Stash: Safe on the farm \nFound a half-buried safe on the farm. I'll store my goods there for now. So far I stashed a jacket, weapon repair kits, a TOZ, and 40 rounds of buckshot.
Stash: Safe on the farm \nFound a half-buried safe on the farm - for now I'll keep my goods in it.
Stash: Safe on the farm \nSoldiers are bastards... Shot me. I can't haul the booze myself. Until I recover, I'll have to leave it here.

Stash: Container in a railcar \nThe guys whispered that someone is hiding something in the railcar on the bridge. Need to check it on the way back. Kinda scary though - there are tons of slime anomalies there...

Stash: Container in a railcar \nYesterday I was chatting with Khobot about life, and that sucker slipped up and blurted out about gear on the Cordon, in a railcar. Kept quiet about the slime anomalies, the bastard.
Stash: Container in a railcar \nBenya screwed up while drunk and blurted out about his stash on the Cordon. Figures he knows nobody will go there because of the slime anomalies...
Stash: Stalker's goods \nHid the goods right under the roof, in the little house near the bridge.
Stash: Stalker's goods \nHid everything I agreed on with Kiryukha in the little house near the bridge, right under the roof. An artifact and a small amount of ammo.
Stash: Stalker's goods \nThe soldiers have gone completely nuts. Had to run from a raid. Left all the profit on the roof.
Stash: Items near the bridge \nGot lucky. Dogs tore a soldier apart. I stashed all his belongings here.
Stash: Items near the bridge \nHid the gear in one of the crates near the bridge. That's it, I'm done. Leaving the Zone, farewell brothers! I won't forget my dear mother!
Stash: Items near the bridge \nI'm getting nervous about my property. The boys are giving me sideways looks. Hid part of it just in case.
Stash: Backpack near the village \nNot far from the rookie camp some stalker got lost or killed. Might be worth checking out his stuff. They say he was coming back from a raid.
Stash: Backpack near the village \nSome guy named Vasya tipped me off about a backpack. Said it's cursed, so not many want to take it. No idea what's so valuable in it.
Stash: Backpack near the village \nNot far from the rookie camp some stalker died... might be worth checking out his stuff.
Stash: Attic in the village \nThere's a stash in the attic. I learned about it from Likhoy. He talked too much, so we took care of him.
Stash: Attic in the village \nSet up an emergency stash for a rainy day in the attic, in Vergas's house.
Stash: Attic in the village \nFound out from Likhoy about a stash in the attic. Supposedly there's a brand-new armor vest there.

Stash: Convenient spot \nSpotted a sweet place for a stash in the attic. So many people have crawled around there already that it's unlikely anyone will search it. Put a bit of junk there as a test. If it gets stolen - no big loss.

Stash: Convenient spot \nSpotted a sweet place for a stash in the attic. So many people have crawled around there already that it's unlikely anyone will search it. Put a bit of junk there as a test. If it gets stolen - no big loss.

Stash: Convenient spot \nSpotted a sweet place for a stash in the attic. So many people have crawled around there already that it's unlikely anyone will search it. Put a bit of junk there as a test. If it gets stolen - no big loss.
Stash: Vorpal's cache \nA stalker stash in the attic, learned about it from Vorpal. Our guys were scouting the area. We'll check it.
Stash: Vorpal's cache \nWas collecting it for Kuznetsov, but it never came in handy.
Stash: Vorpal's cache \nThere's a stash in the attic, found out about it from Vorpal. Our guys were scouting the area. We'll check it.
Stash: Commander's valuables \nThey say the commander has a clever hidden drawer in his office, and it's full of valuable goods!
Stash: Commander's valuables \nThey say the commander has a clever hidden drawer in his office, and it's full of valuable goods.
Stash: Commander's valuables \nThey say the commander has a clever hidden drawer in his office, and it's full of valuable goods.
Stash: By the country road \nKovalchuk said yesterday that a stalker got taken out near the rookie camp, bragging about some good loot under the bridge.
Stash: By the country road \nNot far from the rookie camp some stalker died, might be worth checking what he was carrying. Who even lets people like that in here?
Stash: By the country road \nVityunya said some smartass set up a stash by the road among the rocks. Probably skimmed some loot.
Stash: Thieves' attic \nDamn bandits showed up. Had to hide the loot in the attic. Now I just need to pick the right moment to grab it.
Stash: Thieves' attic \nLifted a little device off Vyaly. I'll sell it to some outsider.
Stash: Thieves' attic \nHid the loot in the bandits' attic while they were gone. Now I just need to choose the moment and take it back.
Stash: Gas pipe \nFound it in a pipe not far from the farm. Once my time in the guardhouse is over, I'll definitely come back.
Stash: Gas pipe \nBy accident I shot a soldier. He fired at me first. I hid his gear in a rusty pipe. When I head back to the trader, I'll swap it for something useful.
Stash: Gas pipe \nDiscovered some gear in a pipe not far from the farm. Once the guardhouse stint is over, I'll definitely come back and take it.
Stash: Hidden items \nSaw a backpack in an overturned car next to some bodies. Should check what's inside, but the radiation there is nasty.
Stash: Hidden items \nDropped a backpack not far from the checkpoint... need to grab it quickly before the commander moves us to another location.
Stash: Hidden items \nWatched soldiers deal with bandits. The soldiers didn't bother searching the bodies. After they left, I took a Duty suit off one of the corpses.
Stash: Checkpoint tower \nA crate with supplies is on the tower. Pick it up on Tuesday, before the shift.
Stash: Checkpoint tower \nForgot my binoculars on the tower at the Garbage while we were scouting for goons.
Stash: Checkpoint tower \nLeft a crate on the tower temporarily. I'll pick it up when I can.
Stash: Backpack in a tree \nTired of rats stealing everything from the box by the campfire. I'll store my stuff here.
Stash: Backpack in a tree \nKum was bragging by the campfire today that he tossed a bag with loot into a tree near the village.
Stash: Backpack in a tree \nTossed the gear up into a tree, away from prying eyes.
Stash: Small cabinet drawer \nHeard that Gray's accomplices keep ammo in a cabinet drawer by the soda machine. Would be nice to check it quietly.

Stash: Small cabinet drawer \nI was going to sleep on a couch in the hangar and put an artifact in the cabinet. An emission woke everyone up at night, total chaos. One thing led to another, morning came. In the confusion I forgot to take my stuff back. Still can't get around to returning.

Stash: Small cabinet drawer \nI was going to sleep on a couch in the hangar and put an artifact along with some small stuff in the cabinet. An emission woke everyone up at night, total chaos. One thing led to another, morning came. In the confusion I forgot to take my stuff back. Still can't get around to returning.
Stash: Old crane \nVasya and I went to check things out... that's where a cop's bullet caught up with Vasya. I had nothing to do with it. A bullet is a fool. I hid the gear in a pipe on the crane.
Stash: Old crane \nTyapa took off to the Thicket at night, had some kind of meeting there. Asked me to keep an eye on the pipe on the crane.
Stash: Old crane \nVasya and I went to see what was what, and that's where a cop's bullet caught Vasya. I had nothing to do with it. A bullet is a fool. I hid the stuff in a pipe on the crane.
Stash: Grizzly's belongings \nAt the Garbage, in the railway tunnel behind the diesel, Grizzly got taken out along with all his gear. Shame about the guy.
Stash: Grizzly's belongings \nAt the Garbage, in the railway tunnel behind the diesel, Grizzly got taken out along with all his gear. Shame about the guy.
Stash: Grizzly's belongings \nKhmury's completely lost it - hauled the shared loot into the tunnel behind the diesel, and the radiation there is so strong your balls glow.
Stash: Pipe on the northern heap \nStashed the loot in a pipe at the Garbage. For a “nuclear war” - anti-rads and vodka.
Stash: Pipe on the northern heap \nI'm attaching the coordinates to the stash with the loot. Just don't fry your balls there - the radiation is off the charts.
Stash: Pipe on the northern heap \nHid the loot in a pipe at the Garbage.
Stash: Cache in scrap metal \nThe items are at the Garbage, inside one pipe. If you don't know exactly where, you'll never find it.
Stash: Cache in scrap metal \nWe were throwing junk into an anomaly and accidentally tossed in the pipe that had the loot hidden inside. So it's still lying there, gathering dust.
Stash: Cache in scrap metal \nThe items are at the Garbage, inside one pipe. If you don't know exactly where, you'll never find it. There's a Beretta 92 and fifty armor-piercing rounds for it.
Stash: Rail by the tankers \nPut some things aside for the return trip when I ran over to Lyokha the junkman. I'll grab it next time.
Stash: Rail by the tankers \nPut some things aside for the return trip when I ran over to Lyokha the junkman. I'll grab it next time.
Stash: Rail by the tankers \nPut some things aside for the return trip when I ran over to Lyokha the junkman. I'll grab it next time.
Stash: Pipe on the eastern heap \nShook down a stalker. Turned out to be a real glutton. We hid part of the food in a pipe.
Stash: Pipe on the eastern heap \nAmong the radioactive trash where few people wander, some useful items are hidden.
Stash: Pipe on the eastern heap \nAmong the radioactive trash where few people go, some useful items are hidden.

Stash: Ownerless backpack \nI was coming from the Dark Valley when a pack of dogs started tailing me. While running, I didn't notice a Trampoline anomaly on the way. It clipped my back with the very edge, hard enough to knock my backpack off. It's probably still lying somewhere there. Shame - there was body armor from Voron inside. Didn't even get to try it on properly.

Stash: Ownerless backpack \nI was coming from the Dark Valley when a pack of dogs started tailing me. While running, I didn't notice a Trampoline anomaly on the way. It clipped my back with the very edge, hard enough to knock my backpack off. It's probably still lying somewhere there. Shame - there was a good pistol and ammo inside.

Stash: Ownerless backpack \nI was coming from the Dark Valley when a pack of dogs started tailing me. While running, I didn't notice a Trampoline anomaly on the way. It clipped my back with the very edge, hard enough to knock my backpack off. It's probably still lying somewhere there. Shame - there was a whole bunch of useful stuff inside.
Stash: Belongings of the killed \nWe whacked a snitch in the swamp and buried him there. Left his loot under a cross, didn't have time to deal with it. A stalker suit and 5.45 ammo.
Stash: Belongings of the killed \nWe whacked a snitch in the swamp and buried him there. Left the loot under a cross, didn't have time to deal with it.
Stash: Belongings of the killed \nAt the den Tyapa was yapping that he hid rounds at the Garbage. Was talking about a cross by the swamp.
Stash: Rotten Stump \nThere's a stash in the stump, a good spot. I hid a Saiga there and 60 rounds of buckshot.
Stash: Rotten Stump \nIn the little patch of forest beyond the swamp I stashed some supplies in a stump, just in case, so I don't have to trek to Vergas again.
Stash: Rotten Stump \nThere's a hideout in the stump, a good place.
Stash: Log in the Forest \nThere's a log in the forest, with a hole inside. The stash is there, time to pick it up.
Stash: Log in the Forest \nI was leaving the forest at the Garbage, heard gunshots - thugs were robbing someone. To be safe, I stashed my loot here. Should come back before the emission.
Stash: Log in the Forest \nThere's a log in the forest, with a hole inside. Three artifacts fit in perfectly.

Stash: Strelok Group Cache \nPetrenko said there's info about a cache belonging to Strelok's group at the Garbage. There should be a hatch down in the lowland. He explained how to open it properly. Once things calm down, I should check it out.
Stash: Strelok Group Cache \nDiggers said that, according to rumors, there was a cache of Strelok's group somewhere in this area. They even saw Fang there.

Stash: Strelok Group Cache \nPetrenko reported that there is information about a cache of Strelok's group at the Garbage. There should be a hatch in the lowland here... he explained how to cleverly open it. Once everything calms down, we'll head there.
Stash: Cache in a Car \nI hid it in a car, Long said it's a good spot. Put a Beretta and some 9?19 ammo there.
Stash: Cache in a Car \nI stashed the ammo in a Zaporozhets, not far from the abandoned vehicle lot.
Stash: Cache in a Car \nI hid it in a car - Long said it's a good place.
Stash: Stalker's Backpack in a Bus \nPut the backpack in the bus... seems unnoticed.
Stash: Stalker's Backpack in a Bus \nPut the backpack in the bus, seems unnoticed. A carbine and ammo for it - I'll need them later.
Stash: Stalker's Backpack in a Bus \nSemyon was bragging while drunk that Sultan promised him a decent gun in a week. Said you'd pick it up in the bus at the Garbage.
Stash: Latrine Supplies \nHardly anyone would think of hiding a stash in a toilet pit, so I'm almost at ease.
Stash: Latrine Supplies \nStored the supplies in a box, in a strange little building around the corner. Still don't understand what that building was for.
Stash: Latrine Supplies \nStored the supplies in a box, in a strange little shack around the corner. Still can't figure out what that building was for. The stash is small, but it'll do for now.
Stash: Safe on the Southern Heap \nWe pitied a loner, gave him a bandage... He was limping in from the Garbage, beat up bad, thought he wouldn't make it. As thanks, he tipped us off about a stash.
Stash: Safe on the Southern Heap \nThere's a half-buried safe on the trash heap - that's where it all is. Mustn't forget.
Stash: Safe on the Southern Heap \nOn the trash heap there's a half-buried safe - that's where it all is. Don't forget.
Stash: Cache in Scrap Metal \nI put the loot in a pipe on the trash heap.
Stash: Cache in Scrap Metal \nI put the loot in a pipe on the trash heap. Ten VOG-25 rounds.
Stash: Cache in Scrap Metal \nI stashed a reserve for a rainy day in a pipe at the Garbage. Heavy radiation.
Stash: Supplies in a Box \nStalkers at the abandoned vehicle lot keep their supplies there.
Stash: Supplies in a Box \nThe commander ordered a retreat over the radio. I stumbled upon a box, dumped excess weight into it and pulled back light.

Stash: Supplies in a Box \nThe commander ordered a retreat over the radio. I came across a box, dumped my excess weight into it and withdrew light. Left a couple hundred armor-piercing rounds for 5.45.
Stash: Pipe by the Bus \nI shoved the loot into a pipe at the Garbage, near the “Radiation” sign. It won't stay there long.
Stash: Pipe by the Bus \nI stashed some rations - when I head to the Swamps, I should grab them.
Stash: Pipe by the Bus \nI shoved the loot into a pipe at the Garbage. It won't stay there long.

Stash: Backpack in the ruins \nI hid the backpack well in the ruins. Hope it'll be easy to retrieve it, if the bandits don't interfere. I've got a Desert Eagle there that I traded for at the Warehouses, plus ammo for it.
Stash: Backpack in the ruins \nWe mugged a stalker. He was coming from the center. Split the cash, and stashed the artifacts.
Stash: Backpack in the ruins \nI hid the backpack well in the ruins. Hope it'll be easy to retrieve it, if the bandits don't interfere.
Stash: Crate at the checkpoint \nWhile Duty were busy shooting it out, I stashed my loot in the trailer. Need to get in there somehow and grab it. And say thanks to “Duty”.
Stash: Crate at the checkpoint \nWhile the “Duty” boys were fighting, I hid the loot in the trailer. Need to get in somehow and take it - and thank “Duty”.
Stash: Crate at the checkpoint \nSupplies from a Duty outpost.
Stash: Dying Man's backpack \nThey say Dying Man kicked the bucket at the Garbage. Need to check it out, see what loot he had. Otherwise too many others will come sniffing around.

Stash: Dying Man's backpack \nThe guys by the campfire said that three days ago a stalker got torn apart by an anomaly down in the lowlands, right in front of them. Supposedly he was coming from the Thicket. But no one dared go for the backpack.
Stash: Dying Man's backpack \nThey say Dying Man died at the Garbage. Need to check it out and look at the loot. Otherwise too many people will rush in.
Stash: String bag in a hatch \nWhile the fleshes were asleep, I stashed my loot right under their noses... or snouts. Let them guard it until I come back.
Stash: String bag in a hatch \nWhile the fleshes were asleep, I stashed my loot right under their noses... or snouts. Let them guard it until I come back.
Stash: String bag in a hatch \nWhile the fleshes were asleep, I stashed my loot right under their noses... or snouts. Let them guard it until I come back.
Stash: Under the bucket \nMan, talk about luck. Lifted a decent artifact off some scrawny guy. Gotta hide it before my own crew buries me. I'll stash it here.
Stash: Under the bucket \nNear the excavator someone died in an anomaly - you can see the backpack, but getting it out is hard.
Stash: Under the bucket \nStopped a hunter. The guy “shared” some homemade sausage. Had to stash part of it.
Stash: Cache under concrete blocks \nBarely squeezed under the beams, but hid the backpack well - no one will crawl in there. Food and a raincoat - everything you need for a trip.
Stash: Cache under concrete blocks \nTraded artifacts with stalkers for ammo and hid it in the ruins. Otherwise Petrenko will haul it all off to the eggheads at Yantar again.
Stash: Cache under concrete blocks \nBarely squeezed under the beams, but hid the backpack well - no one will get in there.

Stash: Gray's hideout \nIn the tunnel, inside a pipe, I stashed grenades and ammo. Also hid an artifact I found right there. Not many people know about this place, shouldn't get stolen. Plus the anomalies at the entrance should discourage anyone from crawling in.

Stash: Gray's hideout \nIn the tunnel, inside a pipe, I put a brand-new gun and ammo. I'll test it later on some weak mutants somewhere on the Cordon. Not many people know about this place, shouldn't get stolen. Plus the anomalies at the entrance should discourage anyone from crawling in.

Stash: Gray's hideout \nIn the tunnel, inside a pipe, I hid the gun I traded from Sherstyuk. I'll test it later on some weak mutants somewhere on the Cordon. Not many people know about this place, shouldn't get stolen. Plus the anomalies at the entrance should discourage anyone from crawling in.
Stash: Hollow stump \nI hid the artifacts in a stump next to the “Radiation” sign.
Stash: Hollow stump \nI hid the artifacts in a stump next to the “Radiation” sign.
Stash: Hollow stump \nI hid the artifacts in a stump next to the “Radiation” sign.
Stash: Cache under the cross \nUnder the cross, near a bush, I buried a bit of food and medical supplies. And the artifact I found there can stay put for now.
Stash: Cache under the cross \nUnder the cross, near a bush, I buried some supplies left over after the raid. And the artifact I found there can stay put for now.

Stash: Cache under the cross \nUnder the cross, near a bush, I buried a gun and a knife I took off a dead bandit. Don't want to show them off yet. Never know if one of his buddies might recognize the distinctive gun.
Stash: Backpack under a tree \nDropped a backpack with a couple of artifacts under a fallen tree. Don't forget to pick it up when I head to Sidor.
Stash: Backpack under a tree \nAfter the emission I was shaking so bad I ditched my backpack under a fallen tree. Once I'm back on my feet, I'll return and grab it.
Stash: Backpack under a tree \nDropped a backpack with a decent artifact under a fallen tree. Don't forget to pick it up when I head to Sidor.
Stash: Chimney sweep's backpack \nSherstyuk wasn't at the “spot” today. Wanted to try selling him artifacts for a machine gun instead of “the white stuff”. Fine, I'll leave it here until next time.

Stash: Chimney sweep's backpack \nSherstyuk wasn't at the “spot” today. And I hauled him 12 bottles, as agreed. Fine, I'll leave it here until next time. Left part of the field rations too. Why the hell did I grab so many?!
Stash: Chimney sweep's backpack \nSherstyuk wasn't at the “spot” today. Wanted to try selling him artifacts for a machine gun instead of “the white stuff”. Fine, I'll leave it here until next time.
Stash: Crate on the roof \nStashed the crate on the factory roof, no one will spot it there. Just hope my ammo doesn't rust in the rain.

Stash: Crate on the roof \nStashed the crate on the factory roof, no one will spot it there. Just hope my meds don't get damp in the rain. Vodka, at least, is safe for sure. If anything, I'll treat myself with it.
Stash: Crate on the roof \nStashed the crate on the factory roof, no one will spot it there. Just hope my repair kits don't get ruined by the rain.

Stash: Drunkard's backpack \nYesterday the soldiers decided to run another raid. As always, at the worst time. Had to bolt light. Ditched the backpack by a railcar, and there was so much good stuff in it...

Stash: Drunkard's backpack \nYesterday the soldiers decided to run another raid. As always, at the worst time. Had to bolt light. Ditched the backpack by a railcar, and there was so much good stuff in it...

Stash: Drunkard's backpack \nYesterday the soldiers decided to run another raid. As always, at the worst time. Had to bolt light. Ditched the backpack by a railcar, and there was so much good stuff in it...
Stash: By the three tanks \nLooks like I stumbled onto some stalker's cache under a cross. I'd take the suit, but my backpack is already stuffed to the brim.
Stash: By the three tanks \nAt night we nicked some contraption from the soldiers along with ammo for it. Buried it under a cross.
Stash: By the three tanks \nLooks like I stumbled onto a Duty cache under a cross. I'd take the suit, but my backpack is already stuffed to the brim.
Stash: Backpack on a window \nIn the eastern building I stashed a backpack with loot so cleverly you can't see it from below. There are a couple of artifacts there.
Stash: Backpack on a window \nIn the eastern building I stashed a backpack with supplies and ammo so cleverly you can't see it from below.
Stash: Backpack on a window \nIn the eastern building I stashed a backpack with gear so cleverly you can't see it from below.

Stash: Radioactive crate \nDyudyay signed over his favorite suit. It's hidden in the eastern building. Just need to stock up on anti-rads before going after it - the radiation level there is really high.

Stash: Radioactive crate \nDyudyay signed over his favorite gun. It's hidden in the eastern building. Just need to stock up on anti-rads before going after it - the radiation level there is really high.

Stash: Radioactive crate \nDyudyay lost his last stash playing dice. Says he hid excess ammo and a few repair kits in the eastern building. Better stock up on anti-rads before going after that loot - the radiation level there is really high.

Stash: Crate in the stairwell \nThey say a group of stalkers set up a stash in the eastern building for a rainy day. They hid everything in a crate under the stairs. Would be nice to poke around there quietly.

Stash: Crate in the stairwell \nThey say a group of stalkers set up a stash in the eastern building for a rainy day. They hid everything in a crate under the stairs. Would be nice to poke around there quietly.

Stash: Crate in the stairwell \nThey say a group of stalkers set up a stash in the eastern building for a rainy day. They hid everything in a crate under the stairs. Would be nice to poke around there quietly.
Stash: Factory crate \nWhy did I trade so much with that soldier?! I can't haul it all in one go. Need to make a stash. Just spotted a suitable crate where I can hide this junk.
Stash: Factory crate \nWhy did I trade so much with that soldier?! I can't haul it all in one go. Need to make a stash. Just spotted a suitable crate where I can hide this junk.
Stash: Factory crate \nFirst time I've found an artifact like this. Should ask the veterans what it's worth. I'll hold onto it for now. Just spotted a suitable crate where I can stash it.

Stash: Bag on the support \nI was rummaging through supplies when Bogdan sounded the alarm. I tossed the bag onto the support and bolted. Wonder who he spotted there? Soldiers, or those strange guys who've taken to prowling around here lately?

Stash: Bag on the support \nI was rummaging through supplies when Bogdan sounded the alarm. I tossed the bag onto the support and bolted. Wonder who he spotted there? Soldiers, or those strange guys who've taken to prowling around here lately?

Stash: Bag on the support \nI was rummaging through supplies when Bogdan sounded the alarm. I tossed the bag onto the support and bolted. Wonder who he spotted there? Soldiers, or those strange guys who've taken to prowling around here lately?

Stash: Junk crate \nGood thing I decided to peek into that tool box. One of the stalkers set up a stash here. Fine, can't deal with it right now. I'll grab everything on my way back from the meet. Just hope the owner doesn't show up first.

Stash: Junk crate \nGood thing I decided to peek into that tool box. One of the stalkers set up a stash here. Fine, can't deal with it right now. I'll grab everything on my way back from the meet. Just hope the owner doesn't show up first.

Stash: Junk crate \nGood thing I decided to peek into that tool box. One of the stalkers set up a stash here. Fine, can't deal with it right now. I'll grab everything on my way back from the meet. Just hope the owner doesn't show up first.

Stash: Safe under a tree \nDidn't think I'd turn out to be such a wimp. Found a safe under a fallen tree. A good place to dump excess weight. Fit the body armor I traded from the soldiers, buckshot, and canned food with medkits.

Stash: Safe under a tree \nLeaned on some young punk here, took a bit of junk off him. Tomorrow the guys from Boar's gang are supposed to show up, I'll hand it all over to grease them. Let the stuff sit in the safe for now, under the fallen tree.
Stash: Safe under a tree \nWhat luck - found two artifacts near the swamp! Better not flash them in front of Savitsky. Spotted a safe nearby under a fallen tree, that's where I'll stash them.

Stash: Items in a pipe \nYesterday I saw how a deserter, the one squatting in a shack in the middle of the swamp, was hiding some junk in a pipe. And he plays the orphan too, begging stalkers for food... Would be worth shaking him down properly.

Stash: Items in a pipe \nYesterday I saw how a deserter, the one squatting in a shack in the middle of the swamp, was hiding some junk in a pipe. And he plays the orphan too, begging stalkers for food... Would be worth shaking him down properly.

Stash: Items in a pipe \nYesterday I saw how a deserter, the one squatting in a shack in the middle of the swamp, was hiding some junk in a pipe. And he plays the orphan too, begging stalkers for food... Would be worth shaking him down properly.

Stash: Archive box \nThey say sometimes Duty squads from Yantar run raids on Agroprom to thin out the mutant population. They keep part of their gear somewhere around there so they don't have to haul it back and forth. If only I could find their stash...

Stash: Government crate \nThe rookie did manage to steal a crate from the bandits and put it into an overturned Niva. Says it looks very official. We should tell the guys to go pick it up.

Stash: Crate with Loot \nPut the loot into a crate, we'll take it later.

If only I could time it right and fleece some sucker.

Stash: Loot in a Safe \nOleh Maslovskyi told how they adapted a buried safe into temporary storage for capsules - convenient, so you don't have to haul everything at once.

Stash: Crashed Helicopter \nI warned them not to fly over the Brain Scorcher - and this is the result. They went down in the middle of the forest. Doubt anyone survived.

Only one of them had enough oxygen left.

Stash: Buried Log \nBefore we put that bastard down, I noticed he was fiddling with something near the log behind the gazebo.
Stash: Buried Log \nBefore we put that freak down, I noticed he was messing around near the log behind the gazebo.
Stash: Backpack under the Dashboard \nI tossed poor Dzban's backpack under the dashboard of an old Moskvich.
Stash: Backpack under the Dashboard \nI threw poor Zhban's backpack under the dashboard of an old Moskvich. He had food and an artifact in there - should pick it up when I get the chance.
Stash: Backpack under the Dashboard \nWouldn't have made it otherwise - in a hurry I stuffed it into the backpack and tossed it into the car. Need to come back with a container.
Stash: Pipe in a Container \nYava deliberately hid the stash in the trash, then went and forgot about it himself. Once we're done with our business, I'll come back and check.
Stash: Pipe in a Container \nWe got pinned down in some yard - there was supposedly something in a pipe by the garbage container. Once we sort things out, I'll come back and check.

Stash: Pipe in a Container \nWe got pinned down in some yard - there was something in a pipe by the garbage container. Once we sort things out, I'll come back and check. As far as I know, there was 5.45 ammo there.
Stash: Backpack under the Fence \nWhile getting away from pursuit, I dropped the backpack under the fence right here.
Stash: Backpack under the Fence \nSince my road to Limansk is “closed,” I'm passing along the coordinates of my backpack with the loot.
Stash: Backpack under the Fence \nWhile fleeing from pursuit, I dropped the backpack under the fence right here.
Stash: Pipe in the Sewer \nFound some kind of stash in a drainage pipe. When we come back, I'll pick it up.
Stash: Pipe in the Sewer \nRodka hauled in some weird crap from Pripyat. Until we figure out what to do with it, we hid it in the sewer.
Stash: Pipe in the Sewer \nFound some kind of stash in a drainage pipe. When we come back, I'll pick it up.
Stash: Pipe under the UAZ \nSome kind of sack with junk was sticking out of a pipe under a UAZ. No time to check it. If I live, I'll take a look.
Stash: Pipe under the UAZ \nSome kind of sack with junk was sticking out of a pipe under a UAZ. No time to check it. If I live, I'll check it out.
Stash: Pipe under the UAZ \nTyoma tipped me off about a stash last week. Said it was a fat one.
Stash: Behind the Garages \nNot far from the construction site, Vladyan set himself up a stash in a pipe.
Stash: Behind the Garages \nSaw someone's stash behind the garages, but didn't have time to check it. Look in the big pipe behind the tree.
Stash: Behind the Garages \nSaw someone's stash behind the garages, but didn't manage to check it. Look in the big pipe behind the tree.

Stash: Backpack under the Bridge \nA rookie next to me got caught by a grenade and was done for on the spot. Danya tossed his backpack under the bridge. He won't need it anymore, but it might come in handy for us later.

Stash: Backpack under the Bridge \nThe newbie right in front of me flew straight into a Springboard and got cooked instantly. Danya tossed his backpack under the bridge. He doesn't need it anymore, but it might come in handy for us. He had a modified SPAS-12 and slugs for it, by the way.
Stash: Backpack under the Bridge \nFound a deserted spot and hauled my supplies into that backpack.
Stash: Injured Man's Belongings \nMytyai left the Zone, so he passed me the coordinates as a farewell. Said he hid his backpack with artifacts there. He doesn't need it anymore.
Stash: Injured Man's Belongings \nSanyok got clipped when we were climbing over the wall. Had to leave his backpack behind just to save him.
Stash: Injured Man's Belongings \nSanyok got clipped when we were climbing over the wall. Had to ditch his backpack to save him.

Stash: Partially Submerged Safe \nKolyan's been running to the ruined bridge way too often lately. Says it's to take a leak, supposedly. But why so far out? Some shy bastard he is. Looks like he's hiding something from his own people, that miser. I'll swing by there one of these days - let him pile up a bit more first.

Stash: Partially Submerged Safe \nKolyan's been running to the ruined bridge way too often lately. Says it's to take a leak, supposedly. But why so far out? Some shy bastard he is. Looks like he's hiding something from his own people, that miser. I'll swing by there one of these days - let him pile up a bit more first.

Stash: Partially Submerged Safe \nKolyan's been running to the ruined bridge way too often lately. Says it's to take a leak, supposedly. But why so far out? Some shy bastard he is. Looks like he's hiding something from his own people, that miser. I'll swing by there one of these days - let him pile up a bit more first.
Stash: Grave with a Gas Mask \nI trust the dead more than the living. My stash is in the cemetery - the far-left grave, marked with a gas mask.
Stash: Grave with a Gas Mask \nI trust the dead more than the living. Hid an artifact in the cemetery - the far-left grave, marked with a gas mask.
Stash: Grave with a Gas Mask \nA deal's a deal! You'll find the stash in the cylinders on the grave of an unknown.

Stash: Satchel under the Stove \nStirlitz kept the stove fired up for three days straight. On the fourth, it sank. But Tyapa keeps his little satchel hidden in there. Would be nice to see what's inside.

Stash: Satchel under the Stove \nStirlitz kept the stove fired up for three days straight. On the fourth, it sank. But Tyapa keeps his little satchel hidden in there. Would be nice to see what's inside.

Stash: Satchel under the Stove \nStirlitz kept the stove fired up for three days straight. On the fourth, it sank. But Tyapa keeps his little satchel hidden in there. Would be nice to see what's inside.
Stash: Hideout near the Bunker \nThey say there used to be a bunker there back when Clear Sky was based in the Swamps. That faction's been gone a long time, but the loot's still lying there.
Stash: Hideout near the Bunker \nWhen Kosoy's gang showed up on the trail, I sank the stash with the loot near a hatch in the water, not far from the Mechanical Yard.
Stash: Hideout near the Bunker \nWhen Kosoy's gang showed up on the path, I sank the loot by a hatch from some bunker under the Swamps, just a couple of steps from the ATP.
Stash: Safe with a Reward \nBarely tore the door off the safe in the corner - heavy as hell, the bastard! Dropped what's not for sale and left it there. I'll grab it on my way back.
Stash: Safe with a Reward \nYesterday my best friend died. Ran into a beast. I hid his personal belongings in the bushes as a keepsake. I'll pass them on to his wife later.
Stash: Safe with a Reward \nKeys to the safe. And from what I know, there's something valuable inside.

Stash: Small Crate under the Tower \nThe guys from the Mechanical Yard were saying Vityunya scored himself a fancy cloak somewhere and stashed it. And I know one of his hideouts under the tower. He used to keep vodka there all the time. I'll take a look when I get the chance.

Stash: Small Crate under the Tower \nThe guys from the Mechanical Yard were saying Vityunya got his hands on some loot somewhere and stashed part of it. And I know one of his hideouts under the tower. He used to keep vodka there all the time. I'll take a look when I get the chance.

Stash: Small Crate under the Tower \nThe guys from the Mechanical Yard were saying Vityunya made a real killing somewhere and stashed part of it. And I know one of his hideouts under the tower. He used to keep vodka there all the time. I'll take a look when I get the chance.
Stash: Pipe from the Cistern \nThe guys and I are piling everything into the pipe section with a valve that runs from the cistern toward the Swamps. We've already scraped together a few trinkets.
Stash: Pipe from the Cistern \nThe guys and I are piling everything into the pipe section with a valve that runs from the cistern toward the Swamps.
Stash: Pipe from the Cistern \nStashed buckshot and AP rounds for the AK-47 for a rainy day, in the pipe by the swamp.
Stash: Crate in the Kitchen \nSet aside an order for the trader in the blue crate in the summer kitchen.
Stash: Crate in the Kitchen \nSet aside the trader's order in the blue crate in the summer kitchen.
Stash: Crate in the Kitchen \nOn the southern farmstead, I keep a crate with repair kits in the summer kitchen - it's saved me more than once.
Stash: Cache in a Log \nBefore heading to another part of the Swamps, I had to lighten the backpack. Stuffed part of the loot into a log.
Stash: Cache in a Log \nBefore heading to another part of the Swamps, I had to lighten the backpack. Stuffed part of the loot into a log.
Stash: Cache in a Log \nBefore heading to another part of the Swamps, I had to lighten the backpack. Stuffed part of the loot into a log.
Stash: Leftover Loot \nI tossed Vitaly's backpack into the reeds, otherwise they'd figure out right away it was me who took him out.

Stash: Leftover Loot \nLifted a backpack with loot right from under some sucker's nose. Didn't carry it far though - to avoid getting burned, had to ditch it nearby in the reeds. Took a quick look - just a couple of cheap artifacts inside.
Stash: Leftover Loot \nSwiped a backpack with loot right from under some sucker's nose. Didn't carry it far - to avoid getting burned, had to toss it into the reeds.
Stash: Safe in the Reeds \nDon't know how a safe like that ended up in the swamp, but it'd be a sin not to use it. Let all my stuff lie there for now.
Stash: Safe in the Reeds \nTraded so much ammo from the soldiers for food that I couldn't haul it all at once, so I stacked it in a nearby safe.
Stash: Safe in the Reeds \nDon't know how a safe like that ended up in the swamp, but it'd be a sin not to use it. Let all my stuff lie there for the time being.
Stash: Stump by the Railway \nWe were passing by the railway when we heard gunfire. I quickly hid my things in a stump behind the boulders.

Stash: Stump by the Railway \nA buddy of mine was carrying a pile of loot when he got ambushed in the Swamps. He didn't make it, but managed to tell me he hid part of the loot in a rotten stump near the railway. I'll have to pick it up.
Stash: Stump by the Railway \nWe were passing by the railway when we heard shots. I quickly hid my things in a stump behind the boulders.
Stash: Electrical Panel Cache \nSet up a hideout in the electrical panel of the transformer shack at the Mechanical Yard. I'll gather more loot, then dump it all to the traders at once.
Stash: Electrical Panel Cache \nElectrical panel of the transformer shack at the farmstead. Anyone else pokes around - it'll kill them.
Stash: Electrical Panel Cache \nElectrical panel of the transformer shack at the farmstead. Anyone else pokes around - it'll kill them.
Stash: Swamp Stump \nThe boss said not to carry too much junk, so I hid my stuff in a stump near the pumping station - in the bushes there, under a tree.
Stash: Swamp Stump \nMade a cache under an old stump by the pumping station. If the next run goes well, I'll drop more there.
Stash: Swamp Stump \nThe guide said not to carry too much junk, so I hid my stuff in a stump near the pumping station - in the bushes, under a tree.
Stash: Lucky's Stash \nAt the processing plant in the Swamps, there's a very valuable stash in the flared pipe.
Stash: Lucky's Stash \nAt the processing plant in the Swamps, there's a very valuable stash in the flared pipe.
Stash: Lucky's Stash \nSeva Lucky, who jumped out of the Whirligig three times, tipped me off about his old stash in the Swamps.

Stash: Driftwood under the Boulders \nI really liked the sausage the hunters make. Tasty, filling, and hardly spoils at all. Took some with me, and decided to hide the rest among the rocks so the beasts wouldn't get to it.
Stash: Driftwood under the Boulders \nI searched for a reliable place for my stash for a long time, and finally found a hollow piece of driftwood in the reeds under the boulders.

Stash: Driftwood under the Boulders \nI searched for a reliable place for my hideout for a long time and finally found one: among the reeds under the boulders there's an old piece of driftwood with a hollow.

Stash: Small Suitcase \nYesterday we were resting after a run at the Mechanical Yard when some shady crew showed up. So we ditched the crate with loot behind the garbage container just in case. You never know what they're thinking. If everything's fine, we'll quietly pick it up tomorrow.

Stash: Small Suitcase \nThey say Syoma got himself a top-notch piece somewhere, but doesn't show it off. I think I know where he keeps it. No wonder he runs to the Mechanical Yard almost every day - says it's just to chat with the local bums. Yeah, right.
Stash: Small Suitcase \nSemyon somehow gets anti-rads and other chemicals for free, plus food and vodka. Someone tipped me off about his stash at the Mechanical Yard.

Stash: Pipe in the Swamp \nI got sick of hauling loot on my back through these bogs, so I dumped it on one of the islands into a partially submerged pipe with a valve. In the reeds, nobody will find it without exact coordinates.
Stash: Pipe in the Swamp \nSome slick guy says he found a way to move loot straight past the Perimeter through the Swamps. We hid a test artifact in the pipe.

Stash: Pipe in the Swamp \nI was fed up hauling that loot through these swamps, so I dumped it on one of the islands into a submerged pipe with a valve. In the reeds, no one's finding it without exact coordinates.
Stash: Backpack in the Swamps \nBarely got away from a swamp beast that time and dropped my backpack. Don't feel like going back there, but the loot I gathered is a pity to lose.
Stash: Backpack in the Swamps \nBarely escaped a swamp creature, but lost my backpack. Don't want to go back there, but I might have to.
Stash: Backpack in the Swamps \nGot my hands on a military body armor by chance and hid it in the swamps.
Stash: Pipe at the Station \nSeryoga Dybenko said he knows where the soldiers keep a stash at the pumping station.

Stash: Pipe at the Station \nLyokha the Proctologist hid something in the flared pipe by the valve at the old pumping station in the middle of the swamp, before the soldiers took it over. He's still kicking himself about it.
Stash: Pipe at the Station \nAt the old pumping station in the middle of the swamp, I hid it in the flared pipe next to the valve.
Stash: Wooden Cross \nIn the grave with the only wooden cross in the row at the church cemetery, I set aside a small stash for a rainy day.
Stash: Wooden Cross \nThe guys say that under the cross with a gas mask at the church cemetery there isn't even a body buried - it's a stash.
Stash: Wooden Cross \nIn the grave with the only wooden cross in the row at the church cemetery, I set aside a small stash for a rainy day.

Stash: Cache in the Reeds \nI left a backpack with raid supplies not far from the church, somewhere in the reeds. Now I can't find it even by the coordinates. Next week I'll send one of the rookies to comb the area again.

Stash: Cache in the Reeds \nI left a backpack with raid supplies not far from the church, somewhere in the reeds. Now I can't find it even by the coordinates. Next week I'll send one of the rookies to comb the area again.

Stash: Cache in the Reeds \nI left a backpack with raid supplies not far from the church, somewhere in the reeds. Now I can't find it even by the coordinates. Next week I'll send one of the rookies to comb the area again.
Stash: Log by the Tower \nKolya Kosoy - may he rest in peace - stashed some of what he found on his last raid in a split tree.
Stash: Log by the Tower \nKolya Kosoy - may he rest in peace - stashed some of what he found on his last raid in a split tree.
Stash: Log by the Tower \nKolya Kosoy - may he rest in peace - stashed some of what he found on his last raid in a split tree.
Stash: Backpack by the Mattress \nLyokha, that blockhead, forgot his backpack where he slept - by the sunken boat next to the mattress.
Stash: Backpack by the Mattress \nSaw one hotshot toss his backpack by a sunken boat before an emission. I'll swing by sometime and see what's inside.

Stash: Backpack by the Mattress \nLyokha, complete idiot, forgot his backpack where he slept - by the sunken boat next to the mattress. And he was carrying the group's food that time; we almost lost Lyokha himself before reaching the spot.
Stash: Cache under the Truck Bed \nUnder the bed of a KAMAZ opposite the bridge, someone hid repair kits in a toolbox.
Stash: Cache under the Truck Bed \nUnder the bed of a KAMAZ opposite the bridge, in a toolbox.
Stash: Cache under the Truck Bed \nFound a mechanic's toolbox and hid my valuables there for the time being. When I get the chance, I'll move them to a proper stash.
Stash: Small Crate in the Stove \nAt the burned-out farmstead, I made a stash of buckshot in the stove. Last time I really could've used it.
Stash: Small Crate in the Stove \nA stash like in the fairy tale about Koschei: the chest is in the stove, the stove is in a burned house, and the house is in the Swamps.
Stash: Small Crate in the Stove \nA hideout like in the fairy tale about Koschei: the chest is in the stove, the stove is in a burned house, and the house is in the Swamps.

Stash: Cache in a Pipe \nAt a rest stop, Mitka shoved his backpack into a pipe lying nearby. Just as we were about to move on, we heard a bloodsucker fighting a boar somewhere beyond the reeds. We bolted, leaving everything behind while it wasn't focused on us. Now that bastard's made a lair there - can't get to the backpack.

Stash: Cache in a Pipe \nAt a rest stop, Mitka shoved his backpack into a pipe lying nearby. Just as we were about to move on, we heard a bloodsucker fighting a boar somewhere beyond the reeds. We bolted, leaving everything behind while it wasn't focused on us. Now that bastard's made a lair there - can't get to the backpack.

Stash: Cache in a Pipe \nAt a rest stop, Mitka shoved his backpack into a pipe lying nearby. Just as we were about to move on, we heard a bloodsucker fighting a boar somewhere beyond the reeds. We bolted, leaving everything behind while it wasn't focused on us. Now that bastard's made a lair there - can't get to the backpack.
Stash: Crate in a Pipe \nSet up a stash with medical supplies. I'll duck in when things get rough.
Stash: Crate in a Pipe \nYet again, didn't take a container on a run and found an artifact. Hid it in a crate in a pipe.
Stash: Crate in a Pipe \nGot hold of some sniper ammo by chance and stashed it in a crate in a pipe.
Stash: Backpack as Payment \nSomeone leaked the coordinates of a stash to me - need to check it out. Supposedly there are artifacts there.
Stash: Backpack as Payment \nThe contents of the backpack - I'm sending its coordinates to your PDA now - will compensate for the financial investment into my pocket.
Stash: Backpack as Payment \nAs per the deal with Dubitsky - a backpack in the Swamps. Coordinates attached.
Stash: Backpack on a Corpse \nTernovsky was supposed to bring a suit, but vanished in the Swamps. All that's left are the coordinates from his last signal.
Stash: Backpack on a Corpse \nGot a tip about a little stash. A backpack on a corpse - they say the guy was hauling ammo for the group.
Stash: Backpack on a Corpse \nHere's a tip on a stash! It's in a backpack, and the backpack is on the back of a corpse.
Stash: Soldier's Backpack \nIn the backpack of a dead soldier you'll find the goods you paid for.

Stash: Soldier's Backpack \nThey say some gang of psychos rigs corpses in the Zone with traps - so people don't go poking around for someone else's loot. I know the coordinates of one such interesting dead body... Wonder what's in his backpack.
Stash: Soldier's Backpack \nStashed food in a dead soldier's backpack. Let him “stand guard.”
Stash: Backpack under the Pipeline \nCoordinates for a backpack lying next to a stalker's corpse under the pipeline.
Stash: Backpack under the Pipeline \nHere, grab the coordinates for the backpack lying next to a stalker's corpse under the pipeline.
Stash: Backpack under the Pipeline \nSpotted a backpack next to a corpse under the pipeline, but didn't have time to crawl after it.
Stash: Fighter's Corpse \nBandits use corpses like these as drop points for loot. They smuggle loot out of the Zone and bring payment in from beyond the Perimeter.
Stash: Fighter's Corpse \nHere's the info: a former young fighter is silently guarding a backpack in the bushes.
Stash: Fighter's Corpse \nHere's the info: a fighter is quietly guarding a backpack with ammunition in the bushes.
Stash: On the Dome Ledge \nI stashed my backpack on the ledge of the church dome. Was hopping across the roof like some mountain goat!

Stash: On the Dome Ledge \nGot dead drunk the other day - had a real blast. Climbed onto the church dome roof to look at the stars and left my backpack with loot there, like an idiot. Now I'm afraid to climb back up.
Stash: On the Dome Ledge \nStashed a backpack on the ledge of the church dome.
Stash: Satchel in the Cabin \nPut the repair kits into a crate in the crane cabin in the reeds.
Stash: Satchel in the Cabin \nFound a little satchel in the swamp, put my belongings into it and stashed it in the crane cabin until better times.
Stash: Satchel in the Cabin \nFound a little satchel in the swamp, put my belongings into it and stashed it in the crane cabin until better times.
Stash: Combination Safe \nLast time we went to see Demyan, I spotted a safe in the Swamps. Didn't have time to check what was inside back then - ought to come back.
Stash: Combination Safe \nCopied the coordinates of his safe stash from a dead stalker.
Stash: Combination Safe \nSpotted a safe in the Swamps. Didn't have time to see what was inside then - should come back and check it out.
Stash: Dead Soldier's Backpack \nNot far from the Mechanical Yard I spotted a soldier's corpse - ought to check his backpack.
Stash: Dead Soldier's Backpack \nThe other day, dogs tore a soldier apart not far from the Mechanical Yard. Once they're gone, I should see what he had...

Stash: Dead Soldier's Backpack \nThe guys said they saw a soldier's corpse not far from the Mechanical Yard, but couldn't check what he had - an anomaly was in the way. After the emission, I'll have a look.
Stash: Glukhar's Backpack \nGlukhar bragged too much, showing off that he'd bring back some unknown artifact from the Swamps... That's where he's lying now, in the swamps, along with that artifact.
Stash: Glukhar's Backpack \nYou'll need to find “Glukhar” by these coordinates - his backpack holds what was owed to Vitka.
Stash: Glukhar's Backpack \nYou'll find “Glukhar” by these coordinates - take from his backpack what's owed to you.
Stash: A Hard-Earned Reward \nI'll reward you with info about valuable loot that's hard to get. Be careful: its former owner ignored my advice - and that was the end of him.
Stash: A Hard-Earned Reward \nThere's a lead on a guy's backpack - he was carrying something valuable, but didn't make it...
Stash: A Hard-Earned Reward \nThey say there's valuable loot here, but it's tough to get. Supposedly the former owner ignored all the advice and got himself killed.

Stash: Small Crate by the Tower \nMet a drifter. Sat by the campfire, had a drink. He shared a clever recipe - how to cook an artifact out of junk in an anomaly. Tried it today and it worked. Hid it, along with another one I found, under the tower.
Stash: Small Crate by the Tower \nA reliable person told me about some loot in an ownerless stash hidden under a tower.
Stash: Small Crate by the Tower \nA reliable source told me about loot in an abandoned stash hidden under the tower.
Stash: Loot as Payment \nLoot in a black backpack under the boulders.
Stash: Loot as Payment \nRan into bandits at night - had to make a quick getaway during the shootout. Dropped the backpack with the cargo between the boulders, behind a bush.
Stash: Loot as Payment \nLoot in a black backpack under the boulders.
Stash: Safe under the Bridge \nIf you want, you can trade vodka with the soldiers for just about anything. I got a tip about a stash where they hide their guns.
Stash: Safe under the Bridge \nA stash in a safe under the bridge, not far from the Mechanical Yard.
Stash: Safe under the Bridge \nThe day before yesterday Vitka dug up some info about a Clear Sky stash. We're planning to check it out.
Stash: Among the Boulders \nTossed a bag with my stuff into a crack between three boulders so I wouldn't draw attention from the guys.
Stash: Among the Boulders \nWas running from a chase and dropped a backpack with stolen loot between the boulders, in the bushes.
Stash: Among the Boulders \nDropped a bag with my belongings into a gap between three boulders so as not to draw attention.
Stash: Under the Bridge \nWe sat under the bridge waiting for the pursuit to run past above us. Left a backpack with some loot there, wedged up against a beam.
Stash: Under the Bridge \nWe sat under the bridge waiting for the pursuit to run past above us. Left a backpack with some loot there, wedged up against a beam.
Stash: Under the Bridge \nWe sat under the bridge waiting for the pursuit to run past above us. Left a backpack with some loot there, wedged up against a beam.
Stash: Backpack under the Railcar \nTo make it easier to run, I left my load under a railcar on the tracks.

Stash: Backpack under the Railcar \nIn the north of the Swamps, while crossing the railway, I noticed a backpack under a railcar torn up by an anomaly. Didn't have a good chance to check what was inside.
Stash: Backpack under the Railcar \nTo make it easier to run, I left my load under a railcar on the railway tracks.
Stash: Manhole near the Station \nBuried my stuff under some manhole near the station so random looters wouldn't get their hands on any of it.
Stash: Manhole near the Station \nBuried my goods under some manhole near the station so nothing of mine would fall to random robbers.
Stash: Manhole near the Station \nThrew my find into a manhole near the pumping station.
Stash: Backpack on the Island \nWas heading to the scientists' base and spotted a stalker's body with an untouched backpack through binoculars. I'll check it later - boars have settled there.
Stash: Backpack on the Island \nThat swamp beast chased me for several kilometers, so on some little island I decided to ditch the backpack - otherwise I'd have died from that marathon.
Stash: Backpack on the Island \nA swamp creature chased me for several kilometers, so on some island I decided to get rid of my backpack - otherwise I'd have dropped dead.
Stash: Driftwood in the Swamps \nWe were crossing the Swamps and I noticed a rotten piece of driftwood near the walkways. Good spot, so I stashed my treasure there.
Stash: Driftwood in the Swamps \nDropped a gun into the driftwood near the walkways. Promised one like that to Semyon.
Stash: Driftwood in the Swamps \nWe were crossing the Swamps and I noticed a rotting stump near the walkways. A good place, so I stashed my valuables there.
Stash: Middle of the Swamp \nRight in the middle of the swamp, on a concrete slab sticking out with bits of rebar, I left a crate with junk so I could make it to dry land.
Stash: Middle of the Swamp \nRight in the middle of the swamp, on some concrete monstrosity with pieces of rebar, I left a crate with junk to get back to solid ground.
Stash: Middle of the Swamp \nThe guys from the Warehouses hooked me up with a decent gun, but ammo's tight, so I stashed it for now.
Stash: Cache among the Bushes \nGot out of the swamp with no strength left to walk, so I dumped my entire load right by the path, among the bushes.
Stash: Cache among the Bushes \nGot out of the swamp with no strength left to walk, so I dumped the whole load right next to the path, among the bushes.
Stash: Cache among the Bushes \nRan out of ammo and ditched the gun in the bushes south of the Southern Farmstead, to head to the trader light.
Stash: Safe behind Deadwood \nBehind a dead tree there's a safe, south of the Fisherman's Hamlet. I put away whatever I had to resist temptation... Once there's enough, I'll go trade with Kuznetsov.
Stash: Safe behind Deadwood \nDropped Duty gear into a safe by the barbed wire near the Fisherman's Hamlet.
Stash: Safe behind Deadwood \nFound this hunk of metal near a dead soldier and put it into a safe behind the Fisherman's Hamlet.
Stash: Stump by a Young Tree \nLet fools pay Gak their cut. I'll stash my share under a stump by a young tree.
Stash: Stump by a Young Tree \nVityok said he left my share in the hollow of a stump by a young tree.
Stash: Stump by a Young Tree \nLet fools pay Kryuk their cut. I'll stash my share under a stump by a young tree.
Stash: Backpack on the Path \nManaged to stagger drunk through the Swamps... Lost a backpack with a good suit. Somewhere around here.
Stash: Backpack on the Path \nRan into a Flesh on the trail, and all I had was a knife. Dropped the backpack there to free up my other hand and move my legs faster. I'll have to come back sometime.

Stash: Backpack on the Path \nRan into a Flesh on the trail with only a knife to my name. Threw the backpack with a cloak into the bushes to free up my other hand and make a run for it. I'll have to come back sometime.

Stash: Stuff in the ZAZ \nWe spent half the night sitting on the roof of a Zaporozhets until our guys showed up. Didn't know who'd reach us first, so I ditched my stuff somewhere nearby. Need to find it in daylight.
Stash: Stuff in the ZAZ \nMikha shoved a found suit into a Zaporozhets near the pumping station - idiot, should've brought it to me instead.

Stash: Stuff in the ZAZ \nWe spent half the night sitting on the roof of a Zaporozhets until our guys arrived. Didn't know who'd get to us first, so I ditched my stuff somewhere nearby. Need to find it in daylight.
Stash: Safe in the Mud \nKruglov gave me the coordinates of a stash. I'll check it in a week or so.
Stash: Safe in the Mud \nOn the edge of the swamp not far from the church, I stuffed all my finds into a safe so looters wouldn't get them.
Stash: Safe in the Mud \nOn the shore of the swamp near the church, I put my find into a safe so it wouldn't fall to looters.
Stash: Church Woodpile \nStashed a spare gun and some other small stuff in the woodpile by the church for the time being.
Stash: Church Woodpile \nStashed a spare gun and some other small stuff in the woodpile by the church for the time being.
Stash: Church Woodpile \nStashed a spare gun and some other small stuff in the woodpile by the church for the time being.
Stash: Stump by a Tree \nDecided I'll keep my loot in a stump by a dead tree. When I decide to clear out of the Swamps for good, I'll pick it up.
Stash: Stump by a Tree \nDecided I'll be piling my loot into a stump by a dead tree. When I make my run from the Swamps, I'll grab it.
Stash: Stump by a Tree \nFound a few artifacts. Never saw ones like these on the Cordon. At first glance, damn expensive. Hid them in an old stump.

Stash: Backpack in the Reeds \nThe soldiers started firing from a chopper, I bolted through the bushes and the backpack strap gave out. And I had so many artifacts in there... took a week to collect them.
Stash: Backpack in the Reeds \nDropped the backpack in thick reeds while fighting off boars. No landmarks at all - good thing I logged the coordinates right away.
Stash: Backpack in the Reeds \nDropped the backpack in the reeds while fighting off boars. No landmarks at all - good thing I punched in the coordinates immediately.
Stash: Crate in a ZIL Cab \nGot damn lucky. While no one was watching, I decided to hide the goods.
Stash: Crate in a ZIL Cab \nSanyok the Lame hauled in a mechanic's toolbox from somewhere. We tossed some valuables into it and left it in the cab of a rusty ZIL.
Stash: Crate in a ZIL Cab \nSanyok the Lame dragged in a mechanic's toolbox from somewhere, so we put some valuables into it and left it in the cab of a rusty ZIL.
Stash: Supply Crate \nLisovets said bandits used to hang around that farmstead all the time. They must've had a stash there for sure. Might be worth looking - maybe something's still hidden there.

Stash: Crate with Loot \nNot far from the Mechanical Yard, among construction debris, I picked out a small crate. Hid a suit in it that I traded off Semyon.

Stash: Crate \nBaragoz came down from the North and left a suit and other junk in the stash. Look east of the pumping station, among the boats.
Stash: Crate \nDuring a raid we heard about a bandit stash - supposedly belonging to Borov's thugs. When Mityai gets back, we'll check it out.
Stash: Crate \nBaragoz came down from the North and left a suit and other junk in the stash. Look east of the pumping station, among the boats.

Stash: Safe by the Mine Cart \nFrom a hill I saw through binoculars how a bloodsucker tore a Duty member apart. When the creature sat down to eat, I dropped it with a scoped carbine, straight in the head. I stashed the dead man's gear by the overturned mine cart. No point letting good stuff go to waste.

Stash: Safe by the Mine Cart \nSaw Mitka Khoryok messing around near the overturned mine cart at night. Probably hiding loot from his own. I should swing by there alone tomorrow and search the place properly.

When the creature sat down to eat, I dropped it with a scoped carbine, straight in the head. I stashed the dead man's armor by the overturned mine cart. No point letting a good piece go to waste.

Stash: Just an Old Stump \nMityai and I were coming back from Limansk through the forest and found a Capsule. The damn thing was irradiated, and of course we didn't have a container. I hid it in a rotten stump we came across along the way.

Stash: Poor Guy's Backpack \nStashed the loot in a backpack so the thugs on the road to Limansk wouldn't latch onto me. I'll pick it up on the way back.

Stash: Backpack under the boulders \nWe responded to an SOS by triangulation, but there was no one left to save - dogs had torn the stalker apart. I hid his backpack under the boulders; there's some kind of strange artifact in there. I'll need to come back with a container, just to be safe.
Stash: Backpack under the boulders \nWe were resting after a raid. Left my spare backpack among the rocks. I'll make time and go get it.

Stash: Zaporozhets on the slope \nNear the descent into the mines, I stashed my finds under the seat of a Zaporozhets. I'll pick them up on my way back to Sakharov.
Stash: Zaporozhets on the slope \nNear the descent into the mines, I stashed my finds and a few repair kits under the seat of a Zaporozhets. I'll pick them up on my way back to Sakharov.
Stash: Zaporozhets on the slope \nLeft some explosives in a Zaporozhets near the old mine. In a couple of days we'll use them on a Giant.
Stash: Stump by the ravine \nNot far from a massive anomaly we hid our junk in a stump. Now we're going to check that thing up close - near a monster like that there have to be valuable artifacts.

Stash: Stump by the ravine \nFinally found my first Capsule. Hid it from my partner in a stump by the ravine.
Stash: Hollow stump \nHeard some screeching and howling behind me. Bolted through the forest and shoved my gear into a hollow stump.
Stash: Hollow stump \nHeard some screeching and howling behind me. Bolted through the forest and shoved the loot I'd found into a hollow stump.

Stash: Backpack in the bushes \nAn emission started, we sprinted through the bushes toward shelter, and I dropped my backpack with artifacts there. Crawled all over afterward, couldn't find it.
Stash: Backpack in the bushes \nAn emission started, we sprinted through the bushes toward shelter, and I dropped my backpack with loot there. Crawled all over afterward, couldn't find it.

Stash: Pipe in a trolley \nHad a lucky walk through the forest today. Shame I didn't bring a container with better shielding. I'll stash the Capsule in a rusty mine cart for now - there's a pipe in it that's just the right size.
Stash: Pipe in a trolley \nHid the advance payment for the hunter, for chimeras, in a pipe inside a mine cart.

Stash: Boulder by the ravine \nDogs pinned us against the ravine. I ditched my backpack behind the boulders and went for a breakout.

Stash: Boulder by the ravine \nWe received orders to urgently verify reports of a large mutant pack appearing in our sector. Ivantsov ordered us to drop all excess gear to save time. I hid the backpack with artifacts behind the boulders.
Stash: Boulder by the ravine \nDogs pinned us against the ravine. I ditched my backpack behind the boulders and went for a breakout.
Stash: Lost item \nAbrasha, the idiot, lost my backpack among the rocks, somewhere around this spot. And now he's too scared to go back for it, bastard.

Stash: Cache in a stump \nZhmenya's a bastard. Said there was a decent artifact here, turned out to be a Capsule. How the hell am I supposed to haul it without a container now?!
Stash: Cache in a stump \nZheka and I stashed some small valuables in a stump in the Red Forest.
Stash: Cache in a stump \nZheka and I stashed some small valuables in a stump in the Red Forest.
Stash: Stump before the forest \nWho knows what's waiting for us in that forest. Better to go in without being overloaded. I'll leave part of the gear in this noticeable rotten stump.

Stash: Stump before the forest \nLyokha Rakovsky and his group hauled in some top-notch loot from Limansk last week. They hid Terty's share not far from the old mine. He'll pick it up once he recovers.
Stash: Stump in the wilderness \nGot lost in the Red Forest and dumped all my junk into the hollow of a stump at this spot.
Stash: Stump in the wilderness \nGot lost in the Red Forest and dumped all my junk into the hollow of a stump at this spot.

Stash: Stump in the wilderness \nPavlik's a lucky one. We'd barely entered the forest when a Capsule rolled right under his feet. Too bad we didn't have a spare container. Had to hide it in the nearest stump.

Stash: Backpack under a rockslide \nAt the exit from the Red Forest, boulders broke loose from a slope and nearly crushed me! Then something dark lunged at me from the top. I bolted so hard I lost my backpack somewhere along the way.

Stash: Gear in a tree hollow \nOn the way to Limansk we hid our belongings in the hollow of a fallen tree near the reserve exit.
Stash: Gear in a tree hollow \nThree days ago Seryoga Popovich came out of the reserve toward the Limansk bridge and ran into the local boys there. Good thing he'd stashed the loot in a log.
Stash: Blue box \nShashkevich found out about the hunter's box where he keeps his loot. Promised to share.

Stash: Strange place \nFell asleep at night under a boulder on my backpack, and woke up somewhere completely different. Tried to figure it out, find that rock again, but soon realized I was just walking in circles around some clearing. Creepy stuff. Decided to drop it.

Stash: Strange place \nFell asleep at night under a boulder on my backpack, and woke up somewhere completely different. Tried to figure it out, find that rock again, but soon realized I was just walking in circles around some clearing. Creepy stuff. Decided to drop it.

Stash: Cursed loot \nAt a rest stop they told a story about a backpack with loot somewhere in the forest. Its owner is said to be the Black Stalker himself. The loot is cursed. At first I thought about going to look for it, but then figured - screw that. What if it's true?

Stash: Backpack in the forest \nFelt like I'd stepped into a horror flick. Don't even know how I made it out of that cursed forest. Lost my backpack. Theoretically, I could've only “misplaced” it in one spot. I'll have to go look for it once I get my head straight.

Stash: Backpack in the forest \nProkhorenko let it slip while drunk that a former Freedomer hooked him up with some sweet armor. Jotted down some coordinates from his PDA. Might be worth checking out.

Stash: Backpack under the boulders \nCould barely stand from exhaustion, crashed out under some boulders. Woke up to find some creature sleeping right next to me, chewing on my bag in its sleep. I bolted from there like an Olympic sprinter! Backpack was the last thing on my mind.

Stash: Backpack in the Bus. \nThey finished someone off here. Everything unnecessary he had on him was stashed in the bus on the road.

Stash: Military Crate \nThe kid was bragging that he'd seen a carbine under the fir tree. Right in the crate, brand new.

Stash: Backpack \nBy the bridge, burers drove me into the tunnel, had to hide the backpack and make a run for it light.

Stash: Backpack \nTook the suit under the bridge, it's safe there.
